attributes.description:
For more information on this vehicle please contact 0877248209. The all-new HONDA FIT 1.5 Executive CVT comes standard with a 4-year/60 000km service plan and a 5-year/200 000km warranty. Roadside assistance of 3 years/200 000km included. The driving experience of this vehicle is sleek and has a generous interior space. The grey cloth seats with leather edges are supportive and cossetting, and fitting a child seat is a piece of cake thanks to the exposed ISOFIX hooks and rear doors that open widely. The front seats in this model are heated if you need to warm an icy bottom in winter. A decently-sized central armrest cubby in front has space for smaller items.

All five seats have three-point safety belts and seat-belt reminders. Other safety features include ABS, EBD, an electromechanical parking brake, stability/traction control, 6 x airbags, hill-start assist, cruise control, LED fog lamps, park distance control (front and rear) and a crystal clear display for the rearview camera

Please visit Honda Menlyn to FIND YOUR FIT trade-ins welcome, in-house finance arranged.
